section.p: The Admission Medications entry codes medications that the patient took prior to admission.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:16758, CONF:16759 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.36"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode (kp)="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7698, R2.0=CONF:1098-7698)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7699, R2.0=CONF:1098-7699)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15518)/@code="42346-7" Medications on Admission (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15519)

SHALL contain [1..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:7701, CONF:7702, CONF:15520)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode (kp)="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7698, R2.0=CONF:1098-7698)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7699, R2.0=CONF:1098-7699)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15518)/@code="42346-7" Medications on Admission (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15519)

SHALL contain [1..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:7701, CONF:7702, CONF:15520)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)

entry.xref: Hospital Admission Medications Section Entries Optional
